results.definition: grant relief or an exemption from a rule or requirement to
examples: She exempted me from the exam
Please excuse me from this class

results.definition: (of persons) freed from or not subject to an obligation or liability (as e.g. taxes) to which others or other things are subject
examples: a beauty somehow exempt from the aging process
only the very poorest citizens should be exempt from income taxes

results.definition: (of goods or funds) not subject to taxation
examples: the funds of nonprofit organizations are nontaxable
